title: Network of Industrial Economics
abstractText:
The objectives of the Network of Industrial Economics workshops/conferences will be:

  1. to provide a forum for regular discussion between researchers working at the forefront of industrial economics in order to stimulate high-quality research;
  2. to develop skills by exposing UK researchers to best practice from other countries;
  3. to improve the (sometimes tenuous) links between theoretical and empirical  research in the area and to identify areas with weak links;
  4. to expand the core group of participants with particular reference to students and recently-appointed scholars.
